alert.note: Alert for Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 3:32PM CDT until August 08 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 332 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kingfisher, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingfisher and Okarche. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
